  <title>EU-Hydro_network.shp</title>
  <abstract>Shapefile belonging to the paper "LamaH | Large-Sample Data for Hydrology and Environmental Sciences for Central Europe", submitted to the journal ESSD (Earth System Science Data) in March 2021.

The features in this shapefile show river segments of the dataset "EU-Hydro_network".

The shapefile EU-Hydro_network contains the layers "Canals_I" and "River_Net_I" (see documentation listed below) from the basins Rhine, Elbe and Danube.
A Strahler order of -1  indicates artificial channels. 

30 attributes, see documentation at:
https://land.copernicus.eu/user-corner/technical-library/eu-hydro_user_guide.pdf

Reference: 
EEA: EU-Hydro â€“ River Network Database, Version 1.2, European Environment Agency under the framework of the Copernicus programme, available at: https://land.copernicus.eu/imagery-in-situ/eu-hydro/eu-hydro-river-network-database (last access: 22.10.2020), 2019.</abstract>
